name: PIES 3.14159... complement ECMAScript 3!
short_description: PIES provide the package/import mechanism which is absent in ES3 (ECMAScript Language Specification 3rd edition, the standard for JavaScript, JScript). And with many selected libraries, PIES will complement ES3!
